original_text: Put yourselves in array against Babylon round about: all ye that bend the bow, shoot at her, spare no arrows: for she hath sinned against the Lord.
korean_text: 바벨론을 둘러 대열을 벌이고 활을 당기는 모든 자여 화살을 아끼지 말고 쏘라 그가 여호와께 범죄하였음이라

sentences.original_text: Put yourselves in array against Babylon round about:
all ye that bend the bow,
for she hath sinned against the Lord.
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀가 주를 거스려 죄를 지었기 때문입니다.
